title: ShopNow
desc: The e-commerce website features secure authentication with JWT, password hashing using bcrypt.js, and an Add to Cart option for both logged-in and guest users. It includes a detailed product page with similar product suggestions and a debouncing search bar for efficient product discovery.

title: StudentSathi
desc: The college-finding website allows users to explore courses with detailed descriptions and related fields. Users can filter colleges based on location, preferred courses, and rankings. It features secure login/signup using JWT, with protected routes for accessing filtering options and career details, ensuring only logged-in users can explore advanced features.
